src_original: niyatadhvajaketau samādhau sthitaḥ sarvasamādhīnāṃ dhvajaṃ dhārayati /
tgt_original: 復有必造幢三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧中必持堅固幢。

src_original: vajre samādhau sthitaḥ sarvasamādhīnnirbhinatti /
tgt_original: 復有金剛三昧，住是三昧者諸三昧無有敢當者。

src_original: dharmapraveśamudre samādhau sthitaḥ sarvadharmān mudrayati /
tgt_original: 復有法所入印三昧，住是三昧者與諸法印相應。

src_original: samādhirājasupratiṣṭhitena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu rājatvena pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
tgt_original: 復有安住三昧，住是三昧者便能住諸三昧。

src_original: raśmimuktena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu raśmayo 'vasaranti /  balavīryeṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu balavīryatāṃ kārayati /
tgt_original: 復有放光明三昧，住是三昧者便能遍照諸三昧。 復有勢進三昧，住是三昧者能以力勢教諸三昧。

src_original: samudgatena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣūdgacchati /
tgt_original: 復有等步三昧，住是三昧者能等行諸三昧。

src_original: niruktinirdeśena samādhinā sarvasamādhivacanapraveśāṃ praviśati /  adhivacanapraveśena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ nāmadheyānyanupraviśati /
tgt_original: 復有入辯才教授三昧，住是三昧者能辯解諸三昧。 復有過量音聲三昧，住是三昧者得入無量名字三昧。

src_original: digvilokena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnavalokayati /  sarvadharmaprabhedena samādhinā sarvadharmaprabhedatāmanupraviśati /  dhāraṇīmudreṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ mudrān dhārayati /  sarvadharmaviviktena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu vivekadharmatāmanupraviśati /
tgt_original: 復有照處處三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧能遍照於諸方面。 復有總持印三昧，住是三昧者能持諸三昧印。

src_original: asaṃpramoṣeṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhayo na muṣyanti /
tgt_original: 復有不忘三昧，住是三昧者不忘諸三昧。

src_original: sarvadharmācalena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣvacalatāyai saṃtiṣṭhate /  samādhau sarvasamādhayaḥ saṃgrahaṃ samavasaraṇaṃ gacchanti /  sarvadharmāmanyane samādhau sarvasamādhaya udayavyayāmanyanatāṃ gacchanti /
tgt_original: 復有一切法所聚海三昧，住是三昧者能使一切諸三昧等行。

src_original: ākāśaspharaṇena samādhinā sarvasamādhaya ākāśe sphuranti /  sarvadharmācchedanena samādhinā sarvasamādhayo 'nupacchedaṃ gacchanti /
tgt_original: 復有虛空普三昧，住是三昧者能遍足諸三昧。

src_original: vajramaṇḍalena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ maṇḍalaṃ dhārayati /  sarvadharmaikarasena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ rasaṃ dhārayati /
tgt_original: 復有金剛部三昧，住是三昧者持諸三昧部。

src_original: raṇaṃ jahena samādhinā sarvopakaraṇakleśāṃ jahāti /
tgt_original: 復有寶勝三昧，住是三昧者降伏諸垢濁。

src_original: sarvadharmānutpādena samādhinā sarvadharmānutpādānirodhaṃ darśayati /  vairocanena samādhinā sarvasamādhīn bhāvayati tapati virocati /
tgt_original: 復有熾炎三昧，住是三昧者能以光炎遍照諸三昧。

src_original: sarvadharmānirodhena samādhinā sarvasamādhīn
tgt_original: 復有無願三昧，住是三昧者於諸法無所取。

src_original: vibhajati / animiṣeṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhayo na kadācit samādhidharmā eṣante /  aniketena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu na kadācid (KpSū 331)  dharmasthitiṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有審住三昧，住是三昧者不見諸法有住處。

src_original: gaganakalpena samādhinā sarvasamādhīn gaganasvabhāvāsāratvāya samanupaśyati /  niścittena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu cittacaitasikā dharmāḥ prahīyante /  rūpāparyantena samādhinā rūpamavabhāsayati /
tgt_original: 復有選擇三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧無意念想。

src_original: vimalapradīpena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ pradīpaṃ karoti /
tgt_original: 復有無垢燈三昧，住是三昧者為諸三昧作燈明。

src_original: sarvadharmāparyantena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣvaparyantajñānaṃ darśayati /  vidyudunmiṣeṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣvaparyantaṃ jñānaṃ darśayati /
tgt_original: 復有無限光三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧無有限量。

src_original: sarvaprabhaṃkareṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu prabhaṃkaramukhamupadarśayati /  dhātuparyantena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnaparyantavijñāpanāyopadarśayati /
tgt_original: 復有作光明三昧，住是三昧者能於諸三昧而有所照。 復有普照明三昧，住是三昧者諸三昧皆在眼前現。

src_original: samādhiśuddhasāreṇa samādhinā śūnyatāṃ samādhidharmeṣvanuprāpnoti /
tgt_original: 復有淨要三昧，住是三昧者逮得等淨三昧。

src_original: merucitreṇa samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu ṛktatāṃ saṃdarśayati /  vimalaprabhena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ malamapakarṣayati /  sarvadharmāsaṃprabhedena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ vyupakṛṣṭatāṃ saṃdarśayati /
tgt_original: 復有無垢光三昧，住是三昧者散諸三昧垢。

src_original: (KpSū 332) ratikareṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu ratiṃ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 復有造樂三昧，住是三昧者受諸三昧樂。

src_original: sarvadharmasvabhāvavikrīḍitena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu rūpānupalabdhiṃ darśayati /  vidyudvikaraṇena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣvalakṣaṇatvaṃ darśayati /  sarvadharmānikṣepavirajena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ virajaṃ jñānamupadarśayati /
tgt_original: 復有電明三昧，住是三昧者為諸三昧作燈明。

src_original: akṣayavatena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnāṃ na kṣayaṃ nākṣayaṃ darśayati /
tgt_original: 復有無盡三昧，住是三昧者不見盡以不盡。

src_original: kṣayāpagatena samādhinā sarvasamādhīnakṣayānupagatāṃ darśayati /
tgt_original: 復有畢盡三昧，住是三昧者見諸三昧盡所可見如不見。

src_original: aniñjitena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu neñjati na vepati na prapañcayati /
tgt_original: 復有不動三昧，住是三昧者令諸三昧不動不覺不戲。

src_original: vivardhanena samādhinā sarvasamādhisamāpattiṣu vivardhamānāṃ jñeyaṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有不別三昧。 住是三昧者不見離別。

src_original: sūryapradīpena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu raśmimukhānyavakirati /  candravimalena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣvālokaṃ (KpSū 333) karoti /
tgt_original: 復有日燈三昧，住是三昧者照諸三昧門。 復有月無垢三昧。 住是三昧者能去諸三昧冥。

src_original: śuddhapratibhāsena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu catasraḥ pratisaṃvidāḥ pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 復有淨光明三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧分別四無礙慧。

src_original: kārākāreṇa samādhinā kāravihārakriyāṃ karoti jñānaketuṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有作明三昧，住是三昧者為諸三昧門作明。 復有造作三昧，住是三昧者為諸三昧作畢竟。 復有諸慧三昧，住是三昧者見諸三昧慧。

src_original: vajropamena samādhinā sarvadharmānnirvedhīkaroti yasya vedhamapi na samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有金剛三昧，住是三昧者決斷諸三昧。

src_original: cittasthitena samādhinā cittaṃ na calati  na vedhati na pratibhāsati na vighātamāpadyate,  na cāsyaivaṃ bhavati “cittametad” iti /
tgt_original: 復有住意三昧，住是三昧者不動不搖不恐不怖亦無意想。

src_original: samantālokena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣvālokaṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有現明三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧悉遍見明。

src_original: supratiṣṭhitena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu supratiṣṭhitatve pratiṣṭhati /
tgt_original: 復有安立三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧善處。

src_original: ratnakūṭena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu ratnakūṭa iva saṃdṛśyate /
tgt_original: 復有寶積三昧，住是三昧者普見諸三昧寶。

src_original: varadharmamudreṇa samādhinā sarvasamādhayo mudritā bhavanti,
tgt_original: 復有法印三昧，住是三昧者印諸三昧從印及不印。

src_original: dharmasamatayā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samatānirmuktaṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有等三昧，住是三昧者不見法有等脫。

src_original: ratiṃ (KpSū 334) jahena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu ratiṃ jahāti /  dharmolkena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣvasamārakṛtāṃ pratilabhate /  akṣarāpagatena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣvekākṣaramapi nopalabhate /  ālaṃbanacchedena samādhinā sarvālaṃbanāṃ vyupacchinatti /  avikāreṇa samādhinā sarvadharmāṇāṃ vikāraṃ nopalabhate /  prakṛtiviśuddhena samādhinā sarvadharmāṇāmupakāraṃ nopalabhate /
tgt_original: 復有棄樂三昧，住是三昧者悉棄諸樂。

src_original: aniketacareṇa samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu niketaṃ nopalabhate /  timirāpagatena samādhinā sarvasamādhicaraṇaṃ na samanupaśyati,  tamoviṣayaṃ samatikrāmati /
tgt_original: 復有過法定三昧，住是三昧者滅諸法之冥在諸三昧上。

src_original: ekavyūhena samādhinā na kaṃciddharmadvayaṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有一行三昧，住是三昧者不見諸法有二。

src_original: ākāranirhāravatā samādhinā sarvadharmāṇāṃ anākāranirhāraṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有眾生所入三昧，住是三昧者不見眾生亦不見所入。 復有一事三昧，住是三昧者不見諸三昧事。 復有厭該眾事三昧，住是三昧者不見有別。

src_original: sarvādhikārasarvabhavatalavikaraṇena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣu nirvedhajñānaṃ praviśati,  yasyānupraveśānna kaṃcit pratilabhate /
tgt_original: 復有散諸生死勞怨三昧，住是三昧者逮得諸厭三昧慧所入處無所覺。

src_original: saṅketarutapraveśena samādhinā sarvarutasaṅketeṣvanupraviśati /  ghoṣavāgbhirakṣaravimuktena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣvakṣaravimuktiṃ (KpSū 336)
tgt_original: 復有眾行音所入三昧，住是三昧者眾行音聲皆悉隨從。 復有脫諸音響字三昧，住是三昧者見諸三昧脫於音字。

src_original: jñānolkāmatā samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu tena bhāsati tapati virocati /
tgt_original: 復有然炬三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧中威德獨明。

src_original: varajñānalakṣaṇavijṛṃbhitena  samādhinā sarvadharmeṣvapariśuddhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ darśayati /
tgt_original: 復有淨相三昧，住是三昧者能淨一切三昧相。

src_original: anabhijñālakṣaṇavatena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣvanabhilakṣaṇārthaṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有無准三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧不見於准。

src_original: sarvākāravaropatena samādhinā sarvadharmasamādhiṣu sarvākāravaropeto bhavati /
tgt_original: 復有具足眾事三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧皆得具足。

src_original: sarvaduḥkhasujahena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣvaniśriyaṃ samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有不願苦樂三昧，住是三昧者不見諸三昧有苦樂。

src_original: akṣayakāraṇena samādhinā sarvadharmeṣvakṣayaṃ na samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有事不減三昧，住是三昧者不見諸三昧有盡。

src_original: dhāraṇapadena samādhinā sarvasamādhīṃ sarvadharmāṃśca dhārayati,
tgt_original: 復有持迹三昧，住是三昧者盡看諸三昧。

src_original: nirodhavidhapraśamena samādhinā sarvadharmānurodhavirodhāṃ na (KpSū 337)  vimalaprabhāsena samādhinā sarvasamādhiṣu saṃskṛtavimalaṃ na samanupaśyati /
tgt_original: 復有無垢光三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧亦不見光亦不見垢。 復有主要三昧，住是三昧者於諸三昧不見無要。
